attributes.action: Banning the wearing of the HIJAB  in public
attributes.additional_details:
The wearing of the Hijab in public is intimidating and contrary to the feeling of well being and integration to the majority of British people.
The wearing of it also poses a potential security risk, and as such should be banned in public.

rejection.details:
Please see the below petition:

Petition Title: Ban conspicuous religious symbols in public places

Created by: Poledu Min

Closing: 30/03/2015
